name: Mr. Bean
description:
Mr. Bean is an arcade game developed by Beyond Reality Games. It was originally released in 2009. It was published by Blast Entertainment. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Mr. Bean on PC, Nintendo DS and PlayStation 2.
It was produced by John Howard Davies, Peter Bennett-Jones and Sue Vertue. John Birkin, John Howard Davies and Paul Weiland directed the game. It was scored by Howard Goodall.
